summary: For gaining XP in the Pickpocket skill without being a thief. Place the Secret Santa note in a target\'s inventory then place your gift(s) of value without getting caught.  1 XP point per gold value on success. Requires SKSE.
descriptionHtml:
For gaining XP in the Pickpocket skill without being a thief.   Instead of stealing, gain experience by giving out gifts anonymously.  Simply place the Secret Santa note in a target\'s inventory then place your gift(s) of value without getting caught.  1 XP skill point gained per total gold value of gifts on success.

Requires SKSE.

The Secret Santa note will be added to your inventory  on mod activation, and silently replenished after use.

Regular stealth/pickpocket skill use and consequences apply.  If caught, you will be accused of pickpocketing and incur a fine.  I found I had more difficulty placing more expensive items at level 43 Pickpocket.  1 to 1 XP for gold value of placed items may need to be adjusted.  Leave a comment.

Like all my mods, Secret Santa is self-contained, meaning no vanilla forms were modified, allowing for the maximum amount of compatibility with other mods.

Enjoy!
author: gigantibyte
